### Chart B

```{r}
water_quality %>% 
  filter(Indicator == "E.coli", Water_Categ == "Groundwater Quality") %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = Year, y = Total_MedVal, fill = Region)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity") +
  xlim(2002, 2019) +
  theme_bw()
```

### Chart C

```{r}
water_quality %>%

  ggplot(aes(x = Year, y = Total_MedVal, fill = Region)) +

  theme_bw()
```
